tool_description: This API serves the prices of the german gasstation market.
name: German Gasstation Prices
title: German Gasstation Prices

api_list.name: https://api.spritstar.de:3000/v1/gasstations/{id}
api_list.description: This Endpoint serves a single gas station and its prices.

api_list.name: https://api.spritstar.de:3000/v1/gasstations
api_list.description: This Endpoint serves all german gas stations and its prices.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://german-gasstation-prices.p.rapidapi.com/v1/gasstations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "german-gasstation-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://german-gasstation-prices.p.rapidapi.com/v1/gasstations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "german-gasstation-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
